name: screenshot
description: Atom editor plugin for creating code screenshots
author: Fabian Meyer

enum.description: Copy to clipboard (with option to save)

openImage.description: When enabled the screenshot will be opened in Atom once saved.

excludeTrailingNewline.description: When enabled and a whole-file screenshot is taken, the final empty line will be excluded.

includeLineNumbersAndGutter.description: When enabled the screenshot includes the gutter and line numbers.

showWrapGuide.description: When enabled the screenshot includes the wrap guide.
